DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study to determine the safety and efficacy of MK-0431 in patients with Type 2 diabetes mellitus who have inadequate glycemic control on diet/exercise therapy
DOC.brief_title: MK-0431 Early Phase II Double-blind Study - Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-043)
DOC.criteria: Patients have type 2 diabetes mellitus On diet/exercise therapy Patients have type 1 diabetes mellitus
